item.title: How to add this? [Rep]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:

The Outsider:

Well you’ll have to convert all the methods obviously for getting playerRights etc. then I assume it’s just a case of copying the class and initializing it.

holy balls. it was in the gui.java
like 5000000 letters lmfao
I’ll have to upload it so u can take a look at it. exceeds 20,000 chars.

item.title: How to add this? [Rep]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:2, topic:423718”]I believe something like this would be in a class of it’s own (ControlPanel.java) and be called upon when you initialize the server i.e. main method.

Edit, is it open source (the control panel file)?[/quote]
yeah its open source. I’ll be checking in the files of where i got it from searching for it
